rishikesh.shapes

Class Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • rishikesh.shapes.Shape
      • rishikesh.shapes.Rectangle

  • public class Rectangle
extends Shape
    This class represents a Rectangle modeled for processing.js
    Version:
    9.20.2017
    Author:
    rdevanathan686

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Rectangle()
      Creates a default instance of a Rectangle object with all dimensions (x, y, width, height) set to zero.
      Rectangle(double x, double y, double width, double height)
      Creates a new instance of a Rectangle object with the left and right edges of the rectangle at x and x + width.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Rectangle

        public Rectangle()
        Creates a default instance of a Rectangle object with all dimensions (x, y, width, height) set to zero.

      • Rectangle

        public Rectangle(double x,
                 double y,
                 double width,
                 double height)
        Creates a new instance of a Rectangle object with the left and right edges of the rectangle at x and x + width. The top and bottom edges are at y and y + height.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of the upper left corner
        y - the y-coordinate of the upper left corner
        width - the pixel width of the Rectangle
        height - the pixel height of the Rectangle

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet drawer)
        Draws a new instance of a Rectangle object with the left and right edges of the rectangle at x and x + width. The top and bottom edges are at y and y + height.
        Overrides:
        draw in class Shape
        Parameters:
        drawer - the canvas to draw the objects on
        Precondition:
        drawer must not be null, and appropriate settings should have been selected (color, fill, etc)
        Postcondition:
        the drawer will have its rectangle mode modified to PApplet.CORNER

      • inWindow

        public boolean inWindow(int width,
                        int height)
        Determines if the rectangle is in the confines of the DrawingSurface
        Parameters:
        width - the width of the DrawingSurface
        height - the height of the DrawingSurface
        Returns:
        boolean value representing if all of the implicit rectangle is in the confines of the window

      • isPointInside

        public boolean isPointInside(double x,
                             double y)
        Description copied from class: Shape
        Determines whether the point x,y is contained inside the Shape
        Specified by:
        isPointInside in class Shape
        Parameters:

        y - the y-coordinate of the point to check
        Returns:

      • overlaps

        public boolean overlaps(Rectangle other)
        Determines if the rectangle overlaps with the given rectangle
        Parameters:
        other - the Rectangle to check the overlap on
        Returns:
        boolean value representing if the other rectangle overlaps on the implicit rectangle
